hero.name: Mahmoud Ebeid
hero.title: Full-Stack JavaScript Developer | React, Next.js, Node.js, React Native

about.summary: Full-Stack JavaScript Developer with hands-on experience in building scalable and responsive web and mobile applications. Proficient in React.js, Next.js, Node.js, and React Native, with strong expertise in backend systems using Express.js, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and Firebase. Skilled in developing SaaS platforms, RESTful APIs, and cross-platform mobile applications. Adept at Agile methodologies, clean code practices, and solving complex technical challenges. Passionate about delivering high-quality software solutions and continuously learning modern technologies.
highlights: Full-stack across React, Next.js, Node.js, React Native

projects.name: Dokany SaaS E-commerce Platform
projects.description: Multi-tenant SaaS e-commerce platform enabling small business owners to create independent online stores with unique domains and dedicated management dashboards.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive SaaS multi-tenant e-commerce platform that allows small business owners to create independent online stores with unique links and dedicated management dashboards. Each seller has a separate storefront and control panel while the system operates on a shared scalable backend. The platform includes a React Native mobile app for store creation in under 5 minutes. Configured a custom mail server (Namecheap) to handle transactional and marketing emails with dedicated addresses for different purposes.
features: Multi-Tenant Architecture: Each seller gets unique subdomain (e.g., mystore.dokaney.store)
Backend: Robust Node.js + PostgreSQL with secure authentication/authorization
Stripe Payment Gateway Integration for secure online transactions
Custom Mail Server (Namecheap) with dedicated email addresses: support@dokaney.store, seller-support@dokaney.store, admin@dokaney.store, marketing@dokaney.store
Dynamic Storefront System: Separate themes and data for each seller
Admin Dashboard: Manage sellers, admins, themes, withdrawals, and email campaigns
React Native Mobile App: Create store in <5 minutes with full management capabilities
Email Marketing: Targeted campaigns by theme, city, or country
Transactional Emails: Order confirmations, shipping updates, and customer notifications
Marketing Automation: Automated email sequences for customer engagement and retention

projects.name: AI-Powered Crop Yield Prediction with Interactive Dashboard | Flask, ML, Firebase
projects.description: AI-driven crop yield prediction with a responsive dashboard, built with Flask and Firebase.
projects.longDescription: A professional project aimed at predicting agricultural crop yields using Artificial Intelligence with a fully interactive user interface. The system combines machine learning with a responsive dashboard to provide accurate predictions and a smooth user experience.
features: Decision Tree model estimates crop yield from environmental data
Front-end built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in two days
Firebase integration for storage, authentication, and authorization
Planned: plant disease detection and weather-based recommendations

projects.name: Movie App | React Native, Flutter, AsyncStorage, External Movie API
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile movie application with favorites, search, and detailed movie information.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive mobile movie application using React Native and Flutter that displays movies from an external API. Users can browse movies, view detailed information, add favorites to AsyncStorage, and search through the movie catalog. The app provides a smooth user experience with native performance and offline favorites storage.
features: Movie browsing with external API integration

projects.name: Movie App | Next.js, MongoDB, Bootstrap, TheMovieDB API
projects.description: Next.js movie app with TMDB search, favorites (MongoDB), and responsive UI.
projects.longDescription: I built a Movie Application using Next.js with dynamic movie search, favorites management, and fully responsive UI. It integrates TheMovieDB API for real-time data and uses MongoDB to persist user favorites. Leveraging dynamic routing and server-side rendering, the app is optimized and scalable.
features: Favorites API with CRUD (add, delete, get, check)

projects.name: Interactive Family Tree Application | React, Bootstrap, SVG
projects.description: Interactive family tree with zoom, profiles, password access, and iOS Safari SVG fix.
projects.longDescription: I developed an interactive Family Tree web application with advanced visualization features and secure access. It supports multiple viewing modes, zoom, and detailed individual profiles. I also implemented a custom fallback to resolve an SVG rendering issue on iOS Safari, ensuring full cross‑browser compatibility.
features: Interactive family tree visualization with multiple viewing modes
Zoom in/out functionality for easier navigation
Detailed profile view for each person
Fixed critical iOS Safari SVG rendering issue with a custom fallback

projects.name: Full E-Commerce Web Application | React, Redux Toolkit, Axios
projects.description: Modern React e-commerce with Redux Toolkit, Axios API integration, and responsive UI.
projects.longDescription: I developed a modern E‑Commerce web application using React on the front-end and Redux Toolkit for scalable state management. The app integrates with an external API via Axios to fetch and display products dynamically, while maintaining a clean, responsive UI across devices.

projects.name: Modern E-Commerce Website for Electronics
projects.description: A modern electronics store with dark/light mode, dynamic products, and responsive UI.
projects.longDescription: I developed a modern e-commerce platform specialized in selling electronics, featuring a professional design and smooth user experience. The website integrates dynamic features that simulate real online stores, such as dark/light mode switch, dynamic product display via external API, fully responsive design, real-time product search, advanced shopping cart (add/remove/update with totals), user authentication with validation, and a clean, scalable codebase.
features: Dynamic product display via external API
Fully responsive design across all devices
Advanced shopping cart (add/remove/update quantities with total calculation)
User authentication (login & signup) with input validation

projects.name: Ice Cream Website – 27 Fully Coded Landing Pages | HTML, CSS, JavaScript
projects.description: 27+ pages for an ice cream brand: responsive, clean, and built with pure HTML/CSS/JS.
projects.longDescription: I developed a complete front-end project for an Ice Cream brand website, consisting of over 27 manually coded pages built with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The project emphasizes responsive design, clean and reusable code, and modern UIs tailored for an e-commerce experience.
features: Product Details Page with Add-to-Cart functionality
Professional About Us and Contact Us pages
Sections for CTA, Newsletter, and Service Features

projects.name: To-Do List App | Built with TypeScript
projects.description: Fully dynamic tasks manager: add/edit/delete, search, and LocalStorage persistence.
projects.longDescription: A fully dynamic web application for managing daily tasks, developed entirely with TypeScript without using any static HTML. All interface elements are generated via DOM manipulation, providing a great opportunity to practice clean coding and robust data handling.
features: Fully dynamic interface powered by JavaScript & TypeScript

projects.name: Figma to Landing Page Conversion | HTML, CSS, Bootstrap
projects.description: Pixel-perfect conversion from Figma to a responsive landing page using Bootstrap.
projects.longDescription: I converted a complete Figma design into a fully functional, interactive, and professional landing page using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. Focused on pixel-perfect accuracy, responsiveness, clean structure, and consistency with the original design. Added smooth animations, clear hierarchy, and simple JS interactivity with basic SEO best practices.
features: Precise Figma-to-code conversion without losing design details
Fully responsive across mobile, tablet, and desktop
Bootstrap-based layout with customized colors and styling
Enhanced UX with animations and intuitive navigation
JavaScript interactivity (smooth scrolling, section navigation, messages)

achievements: Completed intensive training in React, React Native, Node.js, MongoDB, Firebase, and Flutter.
Built and deployed full-stack projects in agile teams.
Gained hands-on experience with responsive design, mobile app development, and cloud integration.
Practiced advanced algorithms and data structures using C++.
Improved problem-solving and coding speed under time constraints.
Prepared for regional and international programming contests.
Optimized blogs and websites using SEO tools (Google Analytics, Ahrefs).
Improved search rankings and increased traffic through keyword research.

education.school: Faculty of Computers and Information Thebes Higher Institute for Computer & Administrative Sciences (Maadi)

courses.name: Advanced CSS: Flexbox, Grid, Responsive Design
